thread.section_title: The Roosevelt Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Busy, Big Hotel - Good Location - Tiny Room
thread.title_full: Busy, Big Hotel - Good Location - Tiny Room - Review of The Roosevelt Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: son h
title: Busy, Big Hotel - Good Location - Tiny Room
text:
Very busy hotel - have to queue for check-in and some of the reception staff were great and some were very unfriendly.
Room - Cosy room 11th floor was very small and no view just looking into rooms of another wing of the hotel. Tiny room only really fitted in the bed, bed very comfortable and room was adequate as we spent all day exploring New York. Loved the city and location of the hotel was great.
